PHRASE.LANG: BeeBeeBots are your loveable, recycled robot suits made from old scrap metal that nobody wants! They are bits of rubbish bundled together with love ready to enjoy their lives reincarnated in PlayStation®Home! Buy me, be me! The BeeBeeBots! [#Legal]
